data.scheme_name: Uttar Pradesh Textile and Garmenting Policy 2022- Stamp Duty Exemption - NYI
data.eligibility: Land, Shed or Industrial Building purchased or taken on lease from the State or Central Government, or their undertakings will be eligible for exemption from stamp duty.
data.conditions:
Calculation of stamp duty exemption will be based on the prevailing circle rates as on the date of purchase of land.

Gautam Budh Nagar district, 75% of stamp duty will be exempted.
data.beneficiaries: Land, Shed or Industrial Building purchased or taken on lease from the State or Central Government, or their undertakings will be eligible for exemption from stamp duty.
data.prerequisites:
Calculation of stamp duty exemption will be based on the prevailing circle rates as on the date of purchase of land.

Gautam Budh Nagar district, 75% of stamp duty will be exempted.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Textile, Department of Textile
data.context: The Uttar Pradesh Textile and Garmenting Policy 2022 aims to boost the textile and garment industry in the state. It was introduced to attract investments, create jobs, and position Uttar Pradesh as a leading hub for textile and apparel manufacturing.
data.objective:
a) Attract investment in the textile and apparel sector to the tune of Rs. 10,000 Crore 
b) Generate employment opportunity for 5 lakh persons 
c) Development of five (05) Textile and Apparel Parks through private sector 
d) 50% increase in earnings of Handloom and Power loom weavers 
e) Modernisation of power looms and their operation through solar energy 
f) Increase production of silk yarn in the state
data.description:
a) Textile & Garmenting units to be set up in the state (except Gautam Budh Nagar district) will be entitled for 100% exemption of stamp duty. In Gautam Budh Nagar district, 75% of stamp duty will be exempted.
b) Land purchased in any part of the State for the development of infrastructure facilities for Textile and Garmenting industry will be eligible for 100% exemption of stamp duty.
c) 100% exemption of stamp duty will be made available to the developer of the PM MITRA Park and private textile park, except in Gautam Budh Nagar district. 
d) 100% exemption of stamp duty will be made available to the first buyer of plot/unit to be set up in a PM MITRA Park and 50% exemption of stamp duty will be made available to the first buyer of every plot/unit to be set up in a textile park/estate developed by a private sector. 
e) 100% exemption of stamp duty will be available to Sericulture (Chaaki and Koya production), threading units to be set up in any part of the State. 
f) Calculation of stamp duty exemption will be based on the prevailing circle rates as on the date of purchase of land for all of the above.
data.how_to_apply: Scheme can be applied through Nivesh Mitra Portal of Uttar Pradesh Government
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Textile, Department of Textile
data.funding_mechanism: The beneficiary will get the benefit after the approval of application by the funding facilitator.
data.highlights: The Department of Handloom and Textiles, Government of Uttar Pradesh shall appoint a team of professionals as Project Management Agency (PMA) for policy implementation and supporting the department in publicizing the policy benefits among national / international investors, brands and other stakeholders and providing prompt support to the investors.
data.additional_info: Preference will be given to those resident/s, in purchase of land from UPSIDA, GIDA, NOIDA, GREATER NOIDA or other authorities, to start new employment.
data.checklist_info_a:
1.Copy of Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
2. Certificate of Incorporation/ Partnership deed/Partnership registration/ Co- operative society 
registration. 
3.KYC Details
data.checklist_info_d: Picup Bhawan, Block A, 4th Floor, Lucknow, UP, 0522-3117976, info@investup.org.in
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing All Textile and Garmenting Units - All Entities - Uttarpradesh - All MSMES & All Non MSMEs
